itunes:title: Meg Squats | finding strength in the gym, life & business
title: Meg Squats | finding strength in the gym, life & business
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
This week, the one & only Meg Squats sits down with Britt for some fun & all the strength gains! Get ready to chat about getting strong, body recomposition, plateaus & how to accurately gage your progress, meal prep, pre & postnatal training, finding balance, non-negotiables & more!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Sweat Collection is now live (I wear smalls)


Follow the podcast

@funandgains.podcast


Follow Britt

insta // @_brittanylupton

youtube // Brittany Lupton

tiktok // brittanylupton
